channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Blue Admin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Blue Admin

item.title: CVE-2021-24581|2024-08-03T19:35:20.193Z -- unknown -- blue%20admin
item.description: The Blue Admin WordPress plugin through 21.06.01 does not sanitise or escape its "Logo Title" setting before outputting in a page, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue. Furthermore, the plugin does not have CSRF check in place when saving its settings, allowing the issue to be exploited via a CSRF attack.
